app.fake_explanation: NOTE: If GPS result is more than %2$f km away from %1$s, the system issue a pseudo-coordinate around %1$s.
app.gsi_attr: The Geospatial Information Authority of Japan
app.out_of_map_desc: GPS result is out of map. GPS function turns off.
app.out_of_map_area: Showing area is out of map. The area moves to default position.
